Table of Contents

Class BufferedContainer<T>

Namespace
osu.Framework.Graphics.Containers
Assembly
osu.Framework.dll

A container that renders its children to an internal framebuffer, and then blits the framebuffer to the screen, instead of directly rendering the children to the screen. This allows otherwise impossible effects to be applied to the appearance of the container at the cost of performance. Such effects include uniform fading of children, blur, and other post-processing effects.

public class BufferedContainer<T> : Container<T>, IDependencyInjectionCandidate, IDisposable, IContainerEnumerable<T>, IContainerCollection<T>, ICollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IEnumerable<T>, IEnumerable, IBufferedContainer, IContainer, IBufferedDrawable, ITexturedShaderDrawable, IDrawable, ITransformable, ISourceGeneratedDependencyActivator, ISourceGeneratedHandleInputCache, ISourceGeneratedLongRunningLoadCache where T : Drawable

Constructors

BufferedContainer(RenderBufferFormat[], bool, bool)

Constructs an empty buffered container.

public BufferedContainer(RenderBufferFormat[] formats = null, bool pixelSnapping = false, bool cachedFrameBuffer = false)

Parameters

formats RenderBufferFormat[]

The render buffer formats attached to the frame buffer of this BufferedContainer.

pixelSnapping bool

Whether the frame buffer position should be snapped to the nearest pixel when blitting. This amounts to setting the texture filtering mode to "nearest".

cachedFrameBuffer bool

Whether the rendered frame buffer should be cached until ForceRedraw() is called or the size of the container (i.e. frame buffer) changes. When disabled, drawing will be clipped to the game window bounds. Enabling can allow drawing larger than (or outside) the game window bounds.

Fields

UsingCachedFrameBuffer

Whether the rendered framebuffer is being cached until ForceRedraw() is called or the size of the container (i.e. framebuffer) changes. If false, then the framebuffer is re-rendered before it is blitted to the screen; equivalent to calling ForceRedraw() every frame.

public readonly bool UsingCachedFrameBuffer

Field Value

bool

Properties

BackgroundColour

The background colour of the framebuffer. Transparent black by default.

public Color4 BackgroundColour { get; set; }

Property Value

Color4

BlurRotation

Rotates the blur kernel clockwise. In degrees. Has no effect if BlurSigma has the same magnitude in both directions.

public float BlurRotation { get; set; }

Property Value

float

BlurSigma

Controls the amount of blurring in two orthogonal directions (X and Y if BlurRotation is zero). Blur is parametrized by a gaussian image filter. This property controls the standard deviation (sigma) of the gaussian kernel.

public Vector2 BlurSigma { get; set; }

Property Value

Vector2

DrawColourInfo

Contains the colour and blending information of this Drawable that are used during draw.

public override DrawColourInfo DrawColourInfo { get; }

Property Value

DrawColourInfo

DrawEffectBlending

The blending which BufferedContainer<T>.BufferedContainerDrawNode uses for the effect.

public BlendingParameters DrawEffectBlending { get; }

Property Value

BlendingParameters

DrawOriginal

If true the original buffered children will be drawn a second time on top of any effect (e.g. blur).

public bool DrawOriginal { get; set; }

Property Value

bool

EffectBlending

The BlendingParameters to use after applying all effects. Default is Inherit. Inherit inherits the blending mode of the original, i.e. Blending is used. Does not affect the original which is drawn when DrawOriginal is true.

public BlendingParameters EffectBlending { get; set; }

Property Value

BlendingParameters

EffectColour

The multiplicative colour of drawn buffered object after applying all effects (e.g. blur). Default is osuTK.Graphics.Color4.White. Does not affect the original which is drawn when DrawOriginal is true.

public ColourInfo EffectColour { get; set; }

Property Value

ColourInfo

EffectPlacement

Whether the buffered effect should be drawn behind or in front of the original. Behind by default. Does not have any effect if DrawOriginal is false.

public EffectPlacement EffectPlacement { get; set; }

Property Value

EffectPlacement

FrameBufferDrawColour

The colour with which the IFrameBuffers are rendered to the screen. A null value implies the IFrameBuffers should be drawn as they are.

public DrawColourInfo? FrameBufferDrawColour { get; }

Property Value

DrawColourInfo?

FrameBufferScale

The scale of the IFrameBuffers drawn relative to the size of this IBufferedDrawable.

public Vector2 FrameBufferScale { get; set; }

Property Value

Vector2

Remarks

The contents of the IFrameBuffers are populated at this scale, however the scale of Drawables remains unaffected.

RedrawOnScale

Whether to redraw this BufferedContainer when the draw scale changes.

public bool RedrawOnScale { get; set; }

Property Value

bool

RequiresChildrenUpdate

Specifies whether this CompositeDrawable requires an update of its children. If the return value is false, then children are not updated and UpdateAfterChildren() is not called.

protected override bool RequiresChildrenUpdate { get; }

Property Value

bool

TextureShader

The IShader to be used for rendering.

public IShader TextureShader { get; }

Property Value

IShader

Methods

protected override RectangleF ComputeChildMaskingBounds()

RectangleF

The RectangleF to be used as the masking bounds for AliveInternalChildren.

Creates a draw node capable of containing all information required to draw this drawable.

protected override DrawNode CreateDrawNode()

Returns

DrawNode

The created draw node.

Creates a view which can be added to a container to display the content of this BufferedContainer<T>.

BufferedContainerView<T>

The view.

Dispose(bool)

Disposes this drawable.

protected override void Dispose(bool isDisposing)

Parameters

isDisposing bool

ForceRedraw()

Forces a redraw of the framebuffer before it is blitted the next time. Only relevant if UsingCachedFrameBuffer is true.

public void ForceRedraw()

OnInvalidate(Invalidation, InvalidationSource)

Invoked when the layout of this Drawable was invalidated.

protected override bool OnInvalidate(Invalidation invalidation, InvalidationSource source)

Parameters

invalidation Invalidation

The flags that the this Drawable was invalidated with.

source InvalidationSource

The source that triggered the invalidation.

Returns

bool

Whether any custom invalidation was performed. Must be true if the DrawNode for this Drawable is to be invalidated.

Remarks

This should be used to perform any custom invalidation logic that cannot be described as a layout.

RegisterForDependencyActivation(IDependencyActivatorRegistry)

Invoked to register dependency activation functions for this object.

public override void RegisterForDependencyActivation(IDependencyActivatorRegistry registry)

Parameters

registry IDependencyActivatorRegistry

The IDependencyActivatorRegistry to register activation functions with.

Update()

Performs a once-per-frame update specific to this Drawable. A more elegant alternative to OnUpdate when deriving from Drawable. Note, that this method is always called before Drawables further down the scene graph are updated.

protected override void Update()

UpdateSubTreeMasking()

Updates all masking calculations for this CompositeDrawable and its AliveInternalChildren. This occurs post-UpdateSubTree() to ensure that all Drawable updates have taken place.

public override bool UpdateSubTreeMasking()

Returns

bool

Whether masking calculations have taken place.
